header.whatsappMessage: Hi, I want to hire your services.

home.intro: Passionate about creating innovative digital solutions, combining skills in web and mobile development with data analysis using cutting-edge technologies.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: I build responsive websites and full-stack applications using modern technologies like Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: Mobile Development
items.description: I develop cross-platform apps with Flutter, integrating features like camera, audio, MQTT, and cloud storage.

items.title: Cloud & Serverless
items.description: I design IoT architectures and distributed cloud applications using Google Cloud, Cloud Run, BigQuery, and Terraform for infrastructure as code.

items.title: Data Analysis & AI
items.description: I perform data analysis, visualizations, and machine learning/deep learning models to extract valuable insights and automate processes.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Computer Science graduate with a solid background in software development, data structures, algorithms, and networking. Strong interest in Cloud Computing, Data Science, Generative AI, and Web Development. I have developed academic and professional projects applying modern technologies to solve real-world problems, focusing on scalable and innovative solutions. Scholarship recipient of the PRONABEC program, part of the top third group of my university, reflecting my commitment to excellence and continuous learning.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have worked on academic and professional projects both independently and in teams, with experience in frontend, backend, and full-stack development. I have participated in the design and implementation of web and mobile applications, system optimization in production, data analysis, API development, and cloud technologies.

items.company: Statistics School, Universidad Nacional de San Agustín (UNSA) – Arequipa, Peru

education.title: Education
education.description: Academic training focused on computer science and the development of modern technical skills, complemented by courses and certifications that strengthen my knowledge in software development, data analysis, cloud computing, and emerging technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I have strong soft skills such as leadership, teamwork, critical thinking, adaptability, continuous learning, effective communication, and analytical problem-solving. I have participated in multiple projects independently and collaboratively, gaining experience in frontend, backend, and full-stack development, database management, API development, and cloud computing, allowing me to adapt to different technical environments and challenges.

form.heading: Let's Work Together!
form.paragraph: I am open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to say hi, feel free to contact me. I look forward to hearing from you!

items.title: Project 1
items.description: Visualizer for Multivariable Time Series Data Imputation with Air Quality datasets using Deep Learning models

items.title: Project 2
items.description: Schedule and user management dashboard for the Statistics School at Universidad Nacional de San Agustín, Arequipa

items.title: Project 3
items.description: This project implements a distributed IoT architecture using Edge, Fog, and Serverless Cloud, where simulated sensors generate data processed locally and securely sent to the cloud for AI analysis. Backend runs on Google Cloud Run, storing data in BigQuery and Cloud Storage, with web and mobile interfaces, all managed via Terraform.

items.title: Project 4
items.description: Flutter app (web/mobile) that connects to HiveMQ via MQTT to capture photos and audio, upload them to Google Cloud Storage, and display URLs with preview on mobile; requires Flutter 3.10+, camera, microphone, and internet permissions, using service account for testing only.
